ISBN-13: 9781932361278.

Title: There's No Toilet Paper... on the Road Less Traveled.
Subtitle: The Best of Travel Humor and Misadventure.
Authors: Doug Lansky.
Categories: Travel.
Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=Bi0XAQAAMAAJ&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&source=gbs_api.
Description: A compendium of humorous travel writing includes contributions from Bill Bryson, Steve Martin, Dave Barry, Art Buchwald, David Letterman, Paul Theroux, and others, presenting stories about everything from surviving in a nudist camp to learning how to use an ice-sheet outhouse in Antarctica.
